mean_cn: adj. 口语的，白话的，通俗的，口语体
mean_en: (of words and language) used in conversation but not in formal speech or writing
sentence: They studied mostly exam vocabulary, but they were unfamiliar with colloquial words like "Wow".
sentence_trans: 他们主要学习考试词汇，但他们不熟悉口语词汇，如“哇”。
word_etyma: col共同 + loqu说 + ial……的 → 两人一起说 → 口语会话的 → 口语的
